snippet: The developer, contending with an industry slowdown, said that it was in talks with banks about extending a bridge loan.
abstract: Chinese developer Agile Property Holdings, contending with an industry slowdown and speculation about ties to China's former security chief, says it is in talks with banks about extending a bridge loan.
lead_paragraph: The developer, contending with an industry slowdown, said that it was in talks with banks about extending a bridge loan.

headline.main: Developer in China Is in Talks for Lifeline
headline.print_headline: Developer in China Is in Talks for Lifeline
